header.description: Base class for models that can be written to disk.

content.name: defaultCompressionType
content.description: How this model's buffer should be compressed by default. This is not necessarily the same as the compression type of the current buffer cache.

content.name: hasBufferCache
content.description: Whether this model currently has a cached buffer. True when the buffer is cached, false when it's not.

content.name: getBuffer
content.description: Returns an uncompressed buffer for this model. If an uncompressed buffer is available in the cache, it will be returned.

arguments.name: cache
arguments.description: Whether or not the buffer that is returned by this method should be cached. If the buffer is already cached, it will not be deleted if this argument is false. False by default.

content.name: getBufferAsync
content.description: Asynchronously returns an uncompressed buffer for this model. If an uncompressed buffer is available in the cache, it will be returned.

arguments.name: cache
arguments.description: Whether or not the buffer that is returned by this method should be cached. If the buffer is already cached, it will not be deleted if this argument is false. False by default.

content.name: getCompressedBuffer
content.description: Returns a wrapper for the compressed buffer for this model. If a buffer in the correct compression format is cached on this model, it will be returned.

arguments.name: targetCompressionType
arguments.description: How the buffer should be compressed. If not given, the default compression type for this model is used.

arguments.name: cache
arguments.description: Whether or not the buffer that is returned by this method should be cached. If the buffer is already cached, it will not be deleted if this argument is false. False by default.

content.name: getCompressedBufferAsync
content.description: Asynchronously returns a wrapper for the compressed buffer for this model. If a buffer in the correct compression format is cached on this model, it will be returned.

arguments.name: targetCompressionType
arguments.description: How the buffer should be compressed. If not given, the default compression type for this model is used.

arguments.name: cache
arguments.description: Whether or not the buffer that is returned by this method should be cached. If the buffer is already cached, it will not be deleted if this argument is false. False by default.

content.name: onChange
content.description: Deletes this model's cache and notifies its owner to do the same. You should never have to call this yourself.
